64.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

120.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

167.movie_plot: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

104.movie_name: Umbrellas of Cherbourg, The (Parapluies de Cherbourg, Les) (1964)
104.movie_plot: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

24.movie_plot: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

148.movie_plot: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

113.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

131.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

52.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

98.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

25.movie_plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

156.movie_plot: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

93.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

51.movie_plot: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

3.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

95.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

134.movie_plot: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

108.movie_plot: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

54.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

159.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

89.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

166.movie_plot: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.
